%USED PACKAGES
\usepackage{algorithm}
\usepackage[noend]{algpseudocode}
\usepackage{amsmath,amssymb,amsthm}
\usepackage{bm}
\usepackage{bbm}
\usepackage{bbold}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{caption}
\usepackage{enumerate}
\usepackage{float}
%\usepackage{fullpage} %Messes up orgmode fragments, making them take the whole page
\usepackage[colorlinks,citecolor=blue,linkcolor=BrickRed]{hyperref}
\usepackage{cleveref}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
%\usepackage[framemethod=TikZ]{mdframed} Seems to change color in orgmode
\usepackage{parskip}
\usepackage{subcaption}
\usepackage{times}
\usepackage[normalem]{ulem}
\usepackage[usenames,dvipsnames]{xcolor}
\usepackage{xspace}
\usepackage[numbers,sort&compress]{natbib}

%Theorems
\newtheorem{theorem}{Theorem}
\newtheorem{claim}{Claim}
\newtheorem{osbservation}{Observation}
\newtheorem{lemma}{Lemma}
\newtheorem{definition}{Definition}

%First argument is file, second is scale
\newcommand{\qFig}[2]{
\begin{figure}[H]
\centering
\includegraphics[scale=#2]{#1}
\end{figure}
}

%Commands for comments
\newcounter{note}[section]
\renewcommand{\thenote}{\thesection.\arabic{note}}

\newcommand{\enote}[1]{\refstepcounter{note}$\ll${\bf Ellis~\thenote:}
	{\sf \color{blue} #1}$\gg$\marginpar{\tiny\bf EH~\thenote}}

%------NOTATION COMMANDS------
\DeclareMathOperator*{\argmin}{arg\,min}
\DeclareMathOperator*{\argmax}{arg\,max}
\newcommand{\bc}[1]{&{\text{$\left(\text{By #1} \right)$}}}%\bc
\newcommand{\bcc}[1]{&&{\text{$\left(\text{By #1} \right)$}}}%\bc
\newcommand{\Cov}{\mathrm{Cov}}%Covariance
\newcommand{\defeq}{\overset{\text{def}}{=}}
\newcommand{\E}{\mathop{{}\mathbb{E}}}%Expectation
\newcommand{\mb}{\mathbb}
\newcommand{\modd}[1]{~(\text{mod } #1 )}
\newcommand{\moddd}[1]{~\text{mod } #1 }
\DeclareMathOperator*{\OPT}{\text{OPT}} %Opt
\newcommand{\poly}{\text{poly}}
\newcommand{\rank}{\ensuremath{\mathrm{Rank}}}%Rank
\newcommand{\spn}{\ensuremath{\mathrm{Span}}}%Span
\newcommand{\st}{\text{\xspace s.t. \xspace}}
\newcommand{\todo}{{\color{red} \textbf{TODO}}}
\newcommand{\Var}{\mathrm{Var}}%Variance
\newcommand{\eps}{\epsilon}%Variance

\newcommand{\mcR}{\mathcal{R}}
\newcommand{\mcS}{\mathcal{S}}

\newcommand{\mcU}{\mathcal{U}}
